title: Has Ivanka Trump’s Line Been Rebranded as ‘Adrienne Vittadini’?
subtitle: In June 2018, a year-old story about Ivanka Trump's line being rebranded circulated as new news.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: In June 2018, Ivanka Trump adopted the alias "Adrienne Vittadini" to market her fashion line to unwitting buyers.
